feed.title: Mark Black
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Book: 100 diskoi kai i istoria tous

link.title: Book: 100 diskoi kai i istoria tous

entry.content:
The booklet __*100 δίσκοι και η ιστορία τους*__ (translation: *100 records and their story*) was prepared by the producers and editors of the *Μελωδία* (translation: *Melody*) radio station and distributed with the issue of newspaper *Καθημερινή* (translation: *The Daily*) of 2003-06-29. It contains 100 short chapters, each telling the story behind the creation of a Greek record.
I've made a list of the 100 records referenced in this booklet, see: [100 δίσκοι και η ιστορία τους](/books/80fc378a-a553-46e3-b45c-bdd21d28eaf2/?100 δίσκοι και η ιστορία τους).
entry.summary: The booklet 100 δίσκοι και η ιστορία τους (translation: 100 records and their story) was prepared by the producers and editors of the Μελωδία (translation: Melody) radio station and distributed with the issue of newspaper Καθημερινή (translation: The Daily) of 2003-06-29. It contains 100 short chapters, each telling the story behind the creation of a Greek record.

entry.title: TV Series: To minore tis avgis

link.title: TV Series: To minore tis avgis

entry.content:
TV series "Το μινόρε της αυγής" ("To minore tis avgis") ran for 2 seasons in 1983 and 1984. Most of the main characters in the series are musicians, and so there is a lot of music in every episode. All episodes are available to watch at the ERT Archive. I have compiled a list of episodes with links to watch them at [Το μινόρε της αυγής][1]. Further, in the page for every episode I have noted the songs that play in that episode.
For some more information and cast details see [To minore tis avgis][2] on IMDB.
[1]: /tv-series/90b29f05-ec37-427c-b8fc-e09cdd4e28b3/?Το μινόρε της αυγής [2]: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0327334/

Most of the main characters in the series are musicians, and so there is a lot of music in every episode. All episodes are available to watch at the ERT Archive. I have compiled a list of episodes with links to watch them at Το μινόρε της αυγής. Further, in the page for every episode I have noted the songs that play in that episode.
